body:
## Using bzlmod with Bazel 6 or later:

1. [Bazel 6] Add `common --enable_bzlmod` to `.bazelrc`.

2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_proto", version = "6.0.2")
```

## Using WORKSPACE:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_proto",
    sha256 = "6fb6767d1bef535310547e03247f7518b03487740c11b6c6adb7952033fe1295",
    strip_prefix = "rules_proto-6.0.2",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/releases/download/6.0.2/rules_proto-6.0.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_proto//proto:repositories.bzl", "rules_proto_dependencies")
rules_proto_dependencies()

load("@rules_proto//proto:setup.bzl", "rules_proto_setup")
rules_proto_setup()

load("@rules_proto//proto:toolchains.bzl", "rules_proto_toolchains")
rules_proto_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* Make rules_cc a production dep by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/215
* Fix Bazel version to 7.1.2, update lock file, fix no bzlmod builds by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/217


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/compare/6.0.0...6.0.2

# NEW FEATURES

When used with Bazel 7, [Protobuf Toolchainization](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1CE6wJHNfKbUPBr7-mmk_0Yo3a4TaqcTPE0OWNuQkhPs/edit) is now available. This allows you to choose where the protobuf compiler (`protoc`) comes from, as well as configure a toolchain for each language you generate proto stubs for.

This de-couples rules_proto from the https://github.com/protocolbuffers/protobuf repository; `rules_proto` no longer depends on `com_google_protobuf`. The Bazel rules in that repository are now maintained by the protobuf team for Google use cases, and may diverge from rules_proto over time.

rules_proto does not include the toolchain implementation. See https://registry.bazel.build/modules/toolchains_protoc for an example module that registers the prebuilt binary from https://github.com/protocolbuffers/protobuf/releases.

The tracking issue for this feature is #179

# BREAKING CHANGES

Upgrading from rules_proto 5.x requires some changes:

- The `load` site for `rules_proto_toolchains` has changed. See the new WORKSPACE snippet below.
- As mentioned above, rules_proto no longer depends on the protobuf repo (commonly as `com_google_protobuf`). As a result, the `rules_proto_dependencies` macro no longer fetches one. For WORKSPACE users, this may affect what version of protobuf you end up with. We recommend explicitly fetching `com_google_protobuf` early in the WORKSPACE file, as the first declaration wins.

# Install

## Using bzlmod with Bazel 6 or later:

1. [Bazel 6] Add `common --enable_bzlmod` to `.bazelrc`.

2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_proto", version = "6.0.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_proto",
    sha256 = "303e86e722a520f6f326a50b41cfc16b98fe6d1955ce46642a5b7a67c11c0f5d",
    strip_prefix = "rules_proto-6.0.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/releases/download/6.0.0/rules_proto-6.0.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_proto//proto:repositories.bzl", "rules_proto_dependencies")
rules_proto_dependencies()

load("@rules_proto//proto:toolchains.bzl", "rules_proto_toolchains")
rules_proto_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* Upgrade WORKSPACE snipped to 4.0.0 release by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/99
* Remove deleted buildkite pipeline from readme by @Yannic in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/98
* Update rules_java to HEAD by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/102
* Update bazel skylib version to prevent failures on newer Bazel versions. by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/104
* Update protobuf to 3.19.1 by @thii in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/108
* Upgrade to protobuf 3.19.2 by @dhalperi in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/109
* Update code annotations to 'starlark' by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/105
* Add link to proto/grpc docs on rules authors SIG by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/111
* [Zlib] update zlib version to zlib-1.2.12 by @ThomasCJY in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/117
* Update protobuf to 3.20.0 by @thii in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/113
* Update readme to point to the latest version by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/124
* migrating to usage of rbe_preconfig and remove bazel-toolchains by @aranguyen in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/134
* Bump rules_cc to 2f8c04c by @shaldengeki in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/130
* update googletest by @aranguyen in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/137
* Update protobuf to v21.5 by @sagmor in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/139
* Internal change by @copybara-service in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/143
* Test automatic import to Piper by @kotlaja in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/145
* Add MODULE.bazel to rules proto by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/147
* Test automatic import to Piper by @kotlaja in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/146
* fix jar shasums for protobuf java/util by @perezd in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/150
* doc: point users to the release page by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/149
* Add protobuf_lite target to protobuf_workspace by @shaldengeki in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/131
* Workaround repository name for bzlmod by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/156
* Update protobuf to v21.7 by @neumann-nico in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/154
* Changing bazel skylib version from 1.1.1 to 1.3.0 by @Clement-Jean in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/158
* Update versions of protobuf by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/161
* docs: explain the roadmap by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/180
* Add protobuf-team to CODEOWNERS by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/183
* chore: add a pre-commit hook config. by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/184
* refactor: remove protobuf_workspace by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/181
* docs: begin generating docs for defs by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/186
* chore: automate releases by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/189
* fix: executable bit for release shell script by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/190
* chore: add missing file needed by release automation by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/191
* Update release_prep.sh by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/192
* chore: add config for Publish to BCR app by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/193
* feat: introduce toolchain helper by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/194
* fix: presubmit does not have access to tests by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/196
* fix: set allowlist_different_package conditionally by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/199
* chore: update protobuf to 23.1 by @benjamin-bader in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/200
* fix: add bazel versions tested to presubmit by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/202
* chore: fix stardoc targets by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/209

## New Contributors
* @Bencodes made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/102
* @thii made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/108
* @dhalperi made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/109
* @aignas made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/105
* @alexeagle made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/111
* @ThomasCJY made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/117
* @aranguyen made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/134
* @shaldengeki made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/130
* @sagmor made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/139
* @copybara-service made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/143
* @kotlaja made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/145
* @perezd made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/150
* @neumann-nico made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/154
* @Clement-Jean made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/158
* @thesayyn made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/181
* @benjamin-bader made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/200

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/compare/4.0.0...6.0.0

name: 6.0.0-rc3
body:
# NEW FEATURES

When used with Bazel 7, [Protobuf Toolchainization](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1CE6wJHNfKbUPBr7-mmk_0Yo3a4TaqcTPE0OWNuQkhPs/edit) is now available. This allows you to choose where the protobuf compiler (`protoc`) comes from, as well as configure a toolchain for each language you generate proto stubs for.

This de-couples rules_proto from the https://github.com/protocolbuffers/protobuf repository; `rules_proto` no longer depends on `com_google_protobuf`. The Bazel rules in that repository are now maintained by the protobuf team for Google use cases, and may diverge from rules_proto over time.

rules_proto does not include the toolchain implementation. See https://registry.bazel.build/modules/toolchains_protoc for an example module that registers the prebuilt binary from https://github.com/protocolbuffers/protobuf/releases.

The tracking issue for this feature is #179

# BREAKING CHANGES

Upgrading from rules_proto 5.x requires some changes:

- The `load` site for `rules_proto_toolchains` has changed. See the new WORKSPACE snippet below.
- As mentioned above, rules_proto no longer depends on the protobuf repo (commonly as `com_google_protobuf`). As a result, the `rules_proto_dependencies` macro no longer fetches one. For WORKSPACE users, this may affect what version of protobuf you end up with. We recommend explicitly fetching `com_google_protobuf` early in the WORKSPACE file, as the first declaration wins.

## Using bzlmod with Bazel 6 or later:

1. [Bazel 6] Add `common --enable_bzlmod` to `.bazelrc`.

2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_proto", version = "6.0.0-rc3")
```

## Using WORKSPACE:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_proto",
    sha256 = "a88d018bdcb8df1ce8185470eb4b4899d778f9ac3a66cb36d514beb81e345282",
    strip_prefix = "rules_proto-6.0.0-rc3",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/releases/download/6.0.0-rc3/rules_proto-6.0.0-rc3.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_proto//proto:repositories.bzl", "rules_proto_dependencies")
rules_proto_dependencies()

load("@rules_proto//proto:toolchains.bzl", "rules_proto_toolchains")
rules_proto_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* fix: add bazel versions tested to presubmit by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/202


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/compare/6.0.0-rc2...6.0.0-rc3

name: 6.0.0-rc2

## Using bzlmod with Bazel 6 or later:

1. [Bazel 6] Add `common --enable_bzlmod` to `.bazelrc`.

2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_proto", version = "6.0.0-rc2")
```

## Using WORKSPACE:

```starlark

    name = "rules_proto",
```

## What's Changed

## New Contributors

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/compare/6.0.0-rc1...6.0.0-rc2

name: 6.0.0-rc0
body:
Note: you cannot use `--incompatible_enable_proto_toolchain_resolution` yet.

## Using bzlmod with Bazel 6 or later:

This release doesn't work with bzlmod due to https://github.com/protocolbuffers/protobuf/issues/14569

## Using WORKSPACE:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "com_google_protobuf",
    sha256 = "616bb3536ac1fff3fb1a141450fa28b875e985712170ea7f1bfe5e5fc41e2cd8",
    strip_prefix = "protobuf-24.4",
    urls = ["https://github.com/protocolbuffers/protobuf/archive/v24.4.tar.gz"],
)

load("@com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl", "protobuf_deps")

protobuf_deps()

http_archive(
    name = "rules_proto",
    sha256 = "903af49528dc37ad2adbb744b317da520f133bc1cbbecbdd2a6c546c9ead080b",
    strip_prefix = "rules_proto-6.0.0-rc0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/releases/download/6.0.0-rc0/rules_proto-6.0.0-rc0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_proto//proto:repositories.bzl", "rules_proto_dependencies", "rules_proto_toolchains")

rules_proto_dependencies()

rules_proto_toolchains()

```


## What's Changed
* docs: explain the roadmap by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/180
* Add protobuf-team to CODEOWNERS by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/183
* chore: add a pre-commit hook config. by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/184
* refactor: remove protobuf_workspace by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/181
* docs: begin generating docs for defs by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/186
* chore: automate releases by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/189
* fix: executable bit for release shell script by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/190
* chore: add missing file needed by release automation by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/191

## New Contributors
* @thesayyn made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/pull/181

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/compare/5.3.0-21.7...6.0.0-rc0

name: rules_proto 5.3.0-21.7
body:
To use this release add the following to your WORKSPACE file:
```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_proto",
    sha256 = "dc3fb206a2cb3441b485eb1e423165b231235a1ea9b031b4433cf7bc1fa460dd",
    strip_prefix = "rules_proto-5.3.0-21.7",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_proto/archive/refs/tags/5.3.0-21.7.tar.gz",
    ],
)
load("@rules_proto//proto:repositories.bzl", "rules_proto_dependencies", "rules_proto_toolchains")
rules_proto_dependencies()
rules_proto_toolchains()
```
